channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: How special is Mike Trout?
item.description: Baseball has been part of American history for a long time. Since the beginning of the game the face of Major League Baseball has change throughout time. From Babe Ruth, Jackie Robinson, to Barry Bonds these men have been considered the greatest in their era. Now a new era has been born and this era is fiercely competitive with promising young faces to take the role of â€œThe Face of the MLB.

item.title: About Brandon Warnke
item.description: Hello, my name is Brandon Warnke and I am currently a sophomore studying Sports Media and Communications at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. Prior to that I was the play-by-play announcer for my high school Kearney High for football, basketball, wrestling, and baseball. I have experiences with adobe premiere, audition, photoshop, and illustrator through classes here at the University. Also I have worked with the radio station on campus.
